content: Can you provide an Excel table that lists five common ingredients for making a cake along with their quantities and measurements?

Certainly! Here's an Excel-style table listing five common ingredients for making a basic cake, along with their quantities and measurements:

| Ingredient        | Quantity | Measurement    |
|-------------------|----------|----------------|
| All-purpose flour | 2        | cups           |
| Granulated sugar  | 1.5      | cups           |
| Unsalted butter   | 0.5      | cup (1 stick)  |
| Eggs              | 3        | large          |
| Milk              | 1        | cup            |

Feel free to adjust the quantities as needed based on your specific recipe or the number of servings you desire.
